title: Trump Administration Immigration Enforcement and Resistance
description: A developing narrative around the Trump administration's immigration policies and enforcement actions, with local and institutional resistance emerging
arc: The storyline begins with the administration seeking Supreme Court backing for Syrian migrant deportations, escalates with Denver's mayor issuing directives to restrict ICE activities, and continues with ICE detention of a Columbia University student amid campus protests. This shows the administration pushing immigration enforcement while facing institutional and local government pushback.
